研究解锁了与心脏病有关的APOB100蛋白质的结构秘密低密度脂蛋白（LDL）（通常称为不良胆固醇）长期以来一直是科学家的雷达，作为心脏病的主要贡献者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/study-unlocks-structural-screntural-screntural-screturs-opbob100-protein-protein-protein-protein-to-to-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/study-unlocks-structural-screntural-screntural-screturs-opbob100-protein-protein-protein-protein-proteed to-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=355a65a2-b940-4f940-4f95-a053-4c64d9218e83 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 21:40:28 -0500 Study unlocks structural secrets of ApoB100 protein linked to heart disease
新研究阐明了胎儿酒精暴露造成的脑损伤胎儿酒精谱系（FASD）的特征是认知能力下降的症状，例如记忆力恶化和决策受损，在全球范围内普遍存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/new-research-sheds-light-on-on-brain-damage-caused-caused-by-fetal-alcohol-cohol-ceplose.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/new-research-sheds-light-on-on-brain-damage-caused-caused-by-fetal-alcohol-ahol-cohol-ceplose.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70cddd00-6084-439a-b096-9fbb0f842388 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 21:35:39 -0500 New research sheds light on brain damage caused by fetal alcohol exposure
研究揭示了在治疗暴饮暴食障碍中常见刺激剂的结果混合的结果Rutgers Health研究人员说，服用常用的刺激剂治疗暴饮暴食障碍的患者经历了不同的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/study-reveals-mixed-results-for-common-stiment-in---------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/study-reveals-mixed-results-for-common-common-stiment-in-reateating-binge-binge-weating-weating-eating-pording-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4A35AF38-FB7C-4817-835E-2F42AE61DCC9 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 21:31:08 -0500 Study reveals mixed results for common stimulant in treating binge eating disorder
红葡萄酒与白葡萄酒：新研究发现总体癌症风险几乎没有差异研究发现，红葡萄酒和白葡萄酒之间的癌症风险没有差异，但是白葡萄酒与女性癌症的风险更高，皮肤癌风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/red-vs-white-wine-new-new-new-new-new-new-finds-little-little-difference-in-overall-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/red-vs-white-wine-new-new-new-new-new-new-finds-little-little-difference-in-overall-cancer-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5E241D5555552524-44F3-8B56-56-5F7E71E034D5 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 21:25:00 -0500 Red vs. white wine: New study finds little difference in overall cancer risk
新研究证实CAR T细胞疗法不会引起继发性癌症根据Perelman School在Nature Medicine报道的新分析，在大量的700多名接受CAR T细胞疗法治疗的患者中，研究人员没有发现该疗法本身在改良的T细胞中引起了任何类型的继发性癌症。宾夕法尼亚大学和宾夕法尼亚医学的艾布拉姆森癌症中心的医学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/new-study-confirms-car-t-cell-t-cell-ther-ther-therapy-therapy-does-not-cause-cause-cause-cause-cardary-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/new-study-confirms-car-t-cell-t-cell-ther-therapy-therapy-does-not-cause-cause-cause-cause-carce-concardary-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d146b98e-1E67-4DA7-4DA7-BA43-754EC924CE87 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 21:24:00 -0500 New study confirms CAR T cell therapy does not cause secondary cancers
